items.title: Connect layers to screens
items.description: Drag connectors from any layer on your artboard. When synced from a design tool, all layers are transferred without the need to create hotspots.

items.title: Fully customizable connectors
items.description: Change connectors to match your brand identity or personal style. You can edit colors, starting and ending points, labels, and more.

items.title: Create logical flows
items.description: Use shapes to illustrate decision trees and conditional flows.

items.title: Speed up your work with styles
items.description: The Overflow styles editor allows you to maintain consistency across your designs by globally updating the styles of connectors, texts, shapes and device skins.

items.title: Annotate and add context
items.description: Use text and shapes to add detail to your presentation and make it more intuitive for your audience to follow.

items.title: Apply device skins with one click
items.description: Increase presentability and consistency by wrapping your artboards with device skins. Overflow automatically detects the most applicable skin for commonly used devices.

items.title: Draw hotspots
items.description: Mark interaction areas on imported screenshots by drawing hotspots and apply connectors to other screens.

items.title: Use boards to organize your flows
items.description: Create user flow diagrams of any size. Organize them into subflows and split them into multiple boards for easier presentation and navigation.
